author: Saum Idd
text: Let's appreciate women who work with girls at community level for doing the most in ensuring girl centered programs protect, empower, inspire and educate them in many issues @weteckenya @EliteLbq @Re_CinemaAfric @CrownTheWoman @shesthefirst @AkiliDada @akirachix @womenstrongintl

author: Saum Idd
text: Investing in their passions and areas they are talented in during the pandemic allows them to grow and learn, being innovative in how they spend their time #investingirls #investingirlseducation @filamujuani @FilamuT @SlumTV_Kenya

author: Saum Idd
text: As a storyteller, availability of reading and writing materials, resources to support creativity, arts, music to allow girls to creatively express themselves is good for their mental health and focus @weteckenya @EliteLbq @tunawiri_pamoja @Re_CinemaAfric @kenyafilmcomm

author: Saum Idd
text: True. Social and economic/ financial empowerment of women and girls in the household level is of essence to cushion them during these hard times https://t.co/qZbJ4Swne8

author: Saum Idd
text: Girls' time during the pandemic is spent in doing domestic chores like tending the farms and looking after their siblings and families. This takes them back from what they have learned about gender roles @Re_CinemaAfric @weteckenya @EliteLbq @tunawiri_pamoja @AkiliDada

author: Saum Idd
text: How sad is this? Something needs to be done https://t.co/gAnL2ZG0KY

author: Saum Idd
text: Learning methods like vocational training, skills development, reading and writing resources, talent building would cushion them during the pandemic
